  • • Cognitive Difficulties: {risk.coreCognitive ? t.common.yes : t.common.no}
  • Duration Criteria: {risk.durationMet ? '✓ Met' : '✗ Not Met'}
  • Functional Impairment: {risk.functionalImpairment ? '✓ Present' : '✗ Absent'}
  • Additional Symptoms: {risk.additionalSymptoms}/7
  • Total Responses: {risk.totalYes}/16
